Name: Mr. Comcast, Avatar of the Feed
Stats: STR 10, DEX 14, CON 16, INT 20, WIS 16, CHA 20
Legendary Actions: 3 per round: Cut the Feed, Overstimulate, Misinformation Pulse
Abilities: Manifest Mind (cast from avatar up to 120 ft away), Broadcast Overload (Mass Suggestion, Synaptic Static, Counterspell, Wall of Force, Steel Wind Strike), Rigged Vote (Recharge 5–6): Overrides player votes with a twisted outcome.

Name: Glitch Knight
Stats: STR 16, DEX 14, CON 14, INT 8, WIS 12, CHA 6
Abilities: Phase Flicker (Recharge 5–6): Resist all damage except force until next turn. Corrupt Slash: +6 to hit, 2d8+3 slashing + 1d8 psychic. Jitter Step: Bonus action teleport 15 ft, gain advantage on next attack.

Name: Media Drone
Stats: STR 4, DEX 16, CON 10, INT 6, WIS 10, CHA 6
Abilities: Signal Disruptor: Spellcasters within 10 ft make CON saves at disadvantage. Buzz & Broadcast: +5 to hit, 2d6 thunder dmg, DC 13 CON save or silenced 1 round. Explosive Malfunction: On death, all within 5 ft must make DC 12 DEX save or take 2d8 force.
